sentences.en: All terms and conditions of this Agreement are separable.
sentences.cn: 本协议所有的条款和协议是独立可分的.

sentences.en: Character is not separable from physical form but is governed by it.
sentences.cn: 性格和外表是分不开的，而且观其形知其性。

sentences.en: Company's administration and internal control can't be separable.
sentences.cn: 公司治理与内部控制二者密不可分.

sentences.en: For inter prediction, the 2 - D interpolation is conducted through separable 1 - D filtering.
sentences.cn: 对于内部预测我们使用两次一维的过滤器来实现二维的过滤.

sentences.en: One should see the processes of growth in distinct and somewhat separable stages.
sentences.cn: 生长的过程应当看成是有差别的、多少可以分开的几个阶段所构成的.

sentences.en: Separable colorants are removable with neutral detergents.
sentences.cn: 色素中含有可剥离色素,应采用中性洗涤剂.

sentences.en: Separable steaming barrel and steaming plate, promising convenient use.
sentences.cn: 蒸笼与蒸盘采用分离式结构,使用更方便.

sentences.en: The lower part of the lamp is separable from the upper part.
sentences.cn: 那盏灯的下半部和上半部是可分离的.

sentences.en: The lower part of the pipe is separable from the upper part.
sentences.cn: 管子的下部可与上部分开.

sentences.en: The moral question is not entirely separable from the financial one.
sentences.cn: 道德问题和财政问题不能截然分开。

sentences.en: Their cups are separable for easy assembling.
There is no individually separable motion or power in the universe.
sentences.cn: 宇宙内不存在独立可分离的运动或力.
这些概念是可以分离的.

sentences.en: This type of bearings is separable, which can only carry axial load.
sentences.cn: 是可分离型轴承, 只能承受轴向载荷.

sentences.en: We hold that the separable verbs are single valence verbs.
sentences.cn: 我们认为离合词是一价动词.

words.tran_cn: 分离性的；倾向分离的；区别性的
分离，分开；间隔，距离；[法] 分居；缺口

trans.tran_en: two things that are separable can be separated or considered separately
